plot: When the gang find themselves in the middle of a robbery at a local convenience store, they all imagine what will happen next.

When the gang involuntarily is in a convenience store when it is getting robbed, each member all have visions of what would happen if they saved the day. Including saving the store with kick ass karate skills, eating hot dogs while the rest of the gang dies, marrying the waitress, getting injured and having Jackie Denardo as your doctor, and becoming a movie star.—James Hake
